author: jmsnell
msg: First step to resolving ABDERA-70. Provides a method to ensure that the Element or Document is fully parsed without resorting to clone().  For now, this simply delegates to toString, but eventually we might want to make it more efficient.  We also may want to edit all of the modification methods to ensure that this is called automatically.
